programme.title: Mscara Negra, (1996, Action)

programme.title: Temporada de Caa, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Wade Whitehouse um policial de uma pequena cidade. Isolado das pessoas ao seu redor, incluindo um pai dominador e uma mulher divorciada, ele se torna obcecado com a resoluo de um acidente de caa fatal, levando a uma srie de acontecimentos trgicos.

programme.title: A Fuga, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Para sair da priso, um criminoso pede a esposa para negociar sua liberdade com um chefe da mfia. Mas quando o plano d errado, o casal tenta fugir para o Mxico.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da mfia japonesa suspeita de ser vtima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: A rvore Da Vida, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: A histria de uma famlia em Waco, Texas, em 1956. O filho mais velho testemunha a perda da inocncia e luta com os ensinamentos conflitantes de seus pais.

programme.title: O Melhor Ladro do Mundo, (2005, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Depois que o marido tem um derrame, Sue Zaidman passa a ser a nica provedora de sua famlia. Ela enfrenta uma fase difcil e turbulenta, e tem que se impor para lidar com os filhos e manter-se firme apesar das adversidades.

programme.title: Prisioneiras Nunca Mais, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: Inspirada em acontecimentos reais, Prisioneiras Nunca Mais conta a histria de Aggie, em busca de suas duas afilhadas, sequestradas pelo pai para serem vendidas como escravas. O filme um drama sobre a realidade do trfico humano.

programme.title: Betty e Coretta, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Estrelando Mary J. Blige e Angela Bassett. Coretta Scott King e a Dra. Betty Shabazz, esposas do Dr. Martin Luther King e de Malcolm X, devem continuar suas vidas como mes solteiras aps o assassinato de seus maridos.

programme.title: Poder Alm da Vida, (2006, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Dan Millman um atleta que tem dinheiro, mulheres perseguindo-o e aptides para participar das Olimpadas. Mas um encontro com Scrates, um homem que questiona tudo, faz sua viso de mundo mudar completamente.

programme.title: O Amor Nunca Morre, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois de anos afastado dos amigos e familiares, produtor musical com a vida pessoal e profissional em frangalhos volta para casa na Carolina do Norte para cuidar do pai doente, num difcil reencontro com questes do passado.

programme.title: Procura da Liberdade, (2021, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Dois homens separados por 100 anos esto unidos em sua busca pela liberdade. Em 1856, um escravo, Samuel Woodward e sua famlia, escapam da Plantao Monroe perto de Richmond, Virgnia.

programme.title: Um Amor para Recordar, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Jamie era a ltima pessoa por quem Landon se apaixonaria. Muito sria e conservadora para seu gosto, filha de um pastor de igreja batista.

programme.title: Un Sac De Billes, (2018, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Dois irmos judeus fogem por toda a Frana durante a ocupao alem na Segunda Guerra Mundial, tentando encontrar sua famlia novamente.

programme.title: O garoto Katsuya tira uma foto de um monstro no lago. Jaspion vai investigar o misterioso lago.

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Um Lobo em Pele de Cordeiro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Em uma terra mgica, em um prado calmo onde ovelhas podem viver sem preocupaes, problemas comeam a aparecer quando um grupo de lobos est instalado nas proximidades.

programme.title: Alex Rider Contra o Tempo, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Alex Rider, adolescente britnico habilidoso em lingustica, mergulho, artes marciais e tiro, recrutado pelo MI6. Sua primeira misso investigar o bilionrio Darrius Sayle, que fez suspeitas doaes de mega computadores s escolas da Inglaterra.

programme.title: Loucas por Amor, Viciadas em Dinheiro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois que seu marido perde o emprego, a dona de casa Bridget forada a assumir um trabalho como auxiliar de limpeza na Casa da Moeda em Kansas City, Missouri, e acaba planejando o roubo de uma fortuna em notas gastas destinadas destruio.

programme.title: Uma Viagem para a Espanha, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Steve Coogan e Rob Brydon conhecem restaurantes e hotis da costa espanhola, trocando piadas e impresses sobre seus almoos, conversando sobre paternidade, masculinidade e envelhecimento.

programme.title: O Recomeo, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Murphy machucou gravemente seu joelho em uma partida que definiria sua carreira. Um dia, quinze anos mais tarde, ele levado de volta ao passado e tem a oportunidade de reconstruir sua histria como sempre sonhou.

programme.title: Nosso Amor, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Em um ntimo retrato do casamento, um casal que divide a vida h muitos anos precisa lidar com uma grave doena. Enquanto vivem o medo da perda, eles usam o humor e a parceria para manter a esperana.

programme.title: 438 Dias, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Os jornalistas suecos Martin Schibbye e Johan Persson cruzam ilegalmente a fronteira da Somlia com a Etipia para relatar como a busca implacvel por petrleo afetou a populao da regio de Ogaden, isolada e cheia de conflitos.

programme.title: Um Homem Comum, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um criminoso de guerra procurado mundo afora conhece uma empregada e um estranho relacionamento surge entre eles. Quando a calmaria parece estabelecida na vida dele, ela descobre que h uma recompensa milionria para quem souber onde o fugitivo est.

programme.title: Caador de Demnios, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: O caador de demnios Jebediah Woodley viaja at uma pequena cidade ao sul do Mississippi na expectativa de enfrentar um demnio. Quando a entidade maligna acidentalmente libertada, ela comea a possuir e matar os moradores da regio.

programme.title: Joey duela com bravura, mas Rex Raptor liberou sua arma secreta: o Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos! Joey precisa descobrir o segredo do presente de Yugi, a carta Mago do Tempo, sem a ajuda de Yugi, ou partir do Reino dos Duelistas no prximo navio.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Bakura, um colega de turma de Yugi, possudo pelos poderes escuros de seu Anel do Milnio, prende Yugi e seus amigos em um Jogo das Sombras no qual eles se tornam as prprias cartas!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: PaniK, o duelista de Pegasus, trapaceia e ganha todas as estrelas de Mai. Yugi jura derrot-lo e recuper-las. Porm, o Castelo de Iluses Escuras de PaniK envolve seus monstros numa nvoa escura. Como Yugi derrotar um inimigo que ele no pode ver?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: A Luz no Fim do Tnel

programme.title: Apesar de sua surpreendente desvantagem, Yugi provoca PaniK destemidamente: Vou acabar com voc em trs turnos. Yugi est blefando ou tem a vantagem nesta batalha de inteligncia?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Kaiba desce at o reino para enfrentar Pegasus! Ser que Kaiba mudou aps sua batalha com Yugi ou ainda o mesmo duelista impiedoso? A resposta jaz numa batalha entre o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis de Kaiba e o Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos de Joey!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A gangue do duelista americano n 1, Bandit Keith, sequestra Joey para uma caverna secreta com um cemitrio como campo de jogo. Enquanto Yugi e seus amigos procuram por ele, Joey enfrenta monstros zumbis que ficam mais forte ao sarem de seus tmulos!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A ltima tentativa de Joey, sua carta da sorte Mago do Tempo, fracassa contra os monstros zumbis de Bandit Keith. Ao passo que sua mar de sorte acaba, ser que suas habilidades melhoradas e amor por sua irm o inspiraro para a vitria?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Presos na caverna labirinto, Yugi e seus amigos encontram uma sada alternativa, mas a porta vigiada pelos Irmos Paradoxo, irmos de Pegasus.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e Joey combinam foras e se defendem dos monstros de seus oponentes, mas as coisas logo mudaro, j que os Irmos Paradoxo invocam o todo-poderoso Guardio do Porto, um monstro que reflete qualquer ataque!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e Joey liberam cada um o seu monstro mais forte, Caveira Invocada e Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos, mas a fora deles perde a imponncia, comparada ao tremendo poder do Guardio do Porto.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Usando a mgica do Olho do Milnio, Pegasus prende a alma de Mokuba dentro de uma carta bem na frente de Kaiba! Para conseguir o direito de desafiar Pegasus, Kaiba precisa derrotar Yugi e pegar suas estrelas primeiro.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Kaiba invoca Drago Supremo de Olhos Azuis, o monstro mais forte do jogo, a fuso de trs Drages Brancos de Olhos Azuis! Yugi perdeu seus poderosos Monstros de Duelo, mas um duelista verdadeiro nunca desiste!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi comea a tecer uma estratgia para destruir o Drago Supremo de Olhos Azuis, mas tem que decidir se vai clamar vitria ou poupar a vida de Kaiba. O corao de Yugi est dividido.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Tendo perdido suas estrelas para Kaiba, assim como sua nica chance de salvar seu av, Yugi est em estado de choque. Ser que Ta pode fazer Yugi recobrar os sentidos ganhando as estrelas de Mai, ensinando o corao do duelista a Yugi?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos entram no castelo e veem que Kaiba est pronto para duelar contra Pegasus, e a alma de Mokuba continua com um futuro incerto! O poder do Olho do Milnio d a Pegasus a habilidade de ler a mente das pessoas.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Kaiba impotente diante do deck Mundo Toon de Pegasus e de sua habilidade de ler mentes. Quando o duelo acaba, Pegasus prende a alma de Kaiba em uma carta, como com o av de Yugi e Mokuba! Yugi est farto!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: a noite da vspera da batalha final, e muitas criaturas esto agitadas! Yugi jura derrotar Pegasus pelo bem de seu av. Tristan lidera uma equipe de reconhecimento para descobrir os segredos de Pegasus.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Diante do olhar sufocante de Pegasus, Yugi se distrai do duelo com Mai. Aps cometer erros de ttica bobos e deixar Mai obter uma vantagem enorme com seu Drago de Estimao da Harpia, ser que Yugi recuperar o foco ou sucumbir presso intensa?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Mai se recuperou de sua derrota anterior para Joey, tornando-se uma duelista melhor. Ser que Yugi aprendeu com sua derrota para Kaiba, ou o sentimento de derrota ainda pesa em seu corao? A resposta est nas cartas!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Joey procura desesperadamente a carta que permitir que ele entre na batalha final, sem perceber que Bandit Keith a roubou. Enquanto ele reluta em aceitar que Serenity ficar cega para sempre, ele recebe ajuda de um novo amigo!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Aps o deck Mquina de Bandit Keith forar Joey a jogar na defensiva, Joey copia a estratgia de Keith e metaliza seu Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos! Sua vitria certa, ou o trapaceiro Bandit Keith tem literalmente uma ltima carta debaixo da manga?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Com seu orgulho por sua fora como duelista em jogo, Joey desafia Yugi pelo direito de enfrentar Pegasus.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi fica chocado quando Joey usa a carta Mago do Tempo contra ele, justamente a carta que ele deu a Joey como sinal de amizade!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi se prepara para a batalha suprema contra Pegasus, com as almas de seu av, Kaiba e Mokuba em jogo. No meio-tempo, Tristan e Bakura se infiltram no castelo para encontrar os irmos Kaiba, mas ser que Bakura est voltando ao seu eu maligno de novo?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 1

programme.title: Pegasus tambm pune Yugi com seu deck Toon e habilidade de ler mentes. Ao passo que Pegasus faz os monstros de Yugi se virarem contra ele, Yugi perde a determinao de batalhar. Ser que Pegasus prender a alma de Yugi em uma carta, assim como com Kaiba?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 2

programme.title: Yugi descobriu como escapar da habilidade de Pegasus de ler mentes: Yugi alterna entre suas duas almas! Yugi consegue destruir o Mundo Toon de Pegasus, mas o duelo s comeou. O prximo nvel do mortal Jogo da Sombra est prestes a comear!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 3

programme.title: Yugi esmorece de cansao sob o poder do devastador Jogo da Sombra. Seus amigos gritam incentivos desesperados, mas suas vozes no conseguem penetrar a esfera de escurido. A chance de vitria de Yugi est esvaecendo, e sua vida tambm.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 4

programme.title: Pegasus invoca Renunciado, um monstro assustador que pode assimilar os Monstros de Duelo de Yugi! Yugi reage com... Kuriboh? A criatura mais fraca e menor do jogo? Yugi desistiu ou tem uma ltima estratgia para arrancar a vitria das garras da derrota?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 5

programme.title: A Saga Pegasus chega ao seu fim, mas uma nova jornada est prestes a comear! Yugi conhece um egpcio misterioso chamado Shadi, que entra na mente de Yugi com a Chave do Milnio.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos retornam do Reino dos Duelistas e conhecem uma jovem chamada Rebecca, que exige que o av de Yugi lhe devolva o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis! Ela veio reivindicar a carta que o av de Yugi roubou do av dela muitos anos atrs!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Rebecca est enganada em acreditar que o av de Yugi roubou o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis do av dela. Yugi precisa defender o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis para ensinar a ela que o que conta no o poder das cartas, mas o corao delas.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A junta de diretores desonestos da KaibaCorp prende Kaiba dentro de um jogo de realidade virtual! Mokuba recruta Yugi e Joey para libertar Kaiba desse jogo sem igual, no qual perder equivale a morrer!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A misso para resgatar Kaiba continua com uma ajudinha de... Mai? Mas ser que Yugi e seus amigos se adaptaro a um mundo virtual em que as regras e estratgias mudam a toda hora?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos resgatam Kaiba, mas ainda esto presos no jogo! A nica sada requer enfrentar o Drago de Cinco Cabeas, mas Joey, Mokuba e Mai perdem todos os seus pontos de vida no difcil duelo!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Um novo aluno, Duke Devlin, derrota Joey em um jogo de Duel Monsters, forando Joey a ser seu servo. Duke fora Joey a usar um uniforme de cachorro e o humilha em pblico, forando Yugi a desafiar Duke para um duelo.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Em troca da liberdade de Joey, Yugi concorda em desistir de Duel Monsters para sempre se ele perder. Sem conhecer bem as regras, Yugi comea mal. As chances dele no melhoram, e Duke revela que criou Monstros dos Dados-Masmorra com a ajuda de Pegasus!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi usa suas habilidades de jogo natas para virar a mesa contra Duke, mas Duke menciona mais uma regra: todas as criaturas ocupam territrio no tabuleiro-grade.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Depois que o todo-poderoso Orgoth, o Implacvel de Duke deixa toda a esquadra de monstros de Yugi em pedaos, Yugi s tem mais um turno antes de perder todos os seus pontos de vida!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Um cartomante arcano rouba o Enigma do Milnio, e Yugi precisa defend-lo em um duelo para recuper-lo! No entanto, no se trata de um simples advinho. Ele um inimigo familiar e formidvel do Reino dos Duelistas. Ou talvez no?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A misteriosa ameaa que controla Bandit Keith estilhaa o Enigma do Milnio antes de atear fogo na arena de duelos! Ser que Yugi consegue remontar o Enigma do Milnio e salvar o esprito antes que tudo seja engolido pelas chamas?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Restam 10 minutos para o fim do 2 tempo. A Academia Polestar precisa de 2 gols para empatar o jogo. Elliot Ember evoluiu para um atacante confivel e respeitado e a equipe se move com ele a cada passo
programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin

programme.title: O senhor Yi foi preso! Raimon Eleven est sozinho contra a equipe analtica Anima Sana. Os jogadores de Raimon decidem vencer o jogo sozinhos usando suas super tcnicas ensinadas pelo Sr. Yi. Eles sero capazes de sobreviver?
programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin
programme.sub-title: Um dia sem o Sr Yi

programme.title: Jogo eliminatrio nmero 4, Raimon enfrenta Academia Real. Corre um boato que a Academia Real usa qualquer ttica, no importa o quo suja, para vencer
programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin
programme.sub-title: A plano engenhoso de Ray Dark

programme.title: Vendo que era apenas um disfarce, Basile desafia os jogadores da Academia Real, apontando os tnis pontiagudos, dizendo que esto trapaceando. A partir da, a moral da Academia Real e os jogadores comeam a desmoronar.
programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin

programme.title: Sonny vai para verificar um jogo na Polestar, esperando ver o incrvel jogo de Elliot novamente. L, ele percebe que Elliot est nas arquibancadas em vez de no campo
programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin
programme.sub-title: A noite que antecede as finais, a resoluo de Sonny

programme.title: a ltima partida das eliminatrias e quem poderia prever uma revanche entre Raimon e Polestar?
programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin

programme.title: o segundo tempo e o jogo est empatado! Raimon est provando ser um oponente digno contra seus rivais. Mesmo com a perna machucada, Sonny no perde o ritmo enquanto o tempo passa chegando aos minutos cruciais.
programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin

programme.title: As finais do Football Frontier finalmente comearam! Cada uma das equipes participantes apresentada na cerimnia de abertura. Entre eles, esto os jogadores da Academia Lua Nova, considerados favoritos no torneio.
programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin

programme.title: A chance de vingana de Elliot chegou, enquanto a Polestar enfrenta a Lua Nova. No entanto, para o Juzo de Ares, a Academia Lua Nova deve produzir resultados.
programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin

programme.title: O Colgio Alpino uma escola requintada do norte, conhecida por seus melhores atacantes, O Prncipe do Gelo, Shawn Froste e a Fria Glacial, Aiden Frost
programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin
programme.sub-title: A princisa de neva do Alpino

programme.title: Em uma reviravolta, o mais novo membro da equipe Alpino entra em campo! A atacante Bunny Cottontail uma fora imprevisvel que nem mesmo seus companheiros parecem compreender!
programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin

programme.title: A equipe da Academia Alia se rene para treinar para a partida. No entanto, Xavier se recusa a entrar. Acreditando que no podem vencer sem Xavier, Hunter tenta convenc-lo, mas acaba desenterrando memrias e o irritando
programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin

programme.title: A perna de Hunter se machucou durante a luta cansativa com Raimon e ele tem quer ser retirado de campo, deixando a Academia Alia perdida. Xavier se lembra continuamente do dia em que conheceu Hunter.
programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez
programme.desc: O desejo de Sasuke por vingana continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses at sua transferncia. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Alvo Na Mira!
programme.desc: Kakashi e a equipe dez partem para deter o akatsuki. Tsunade considera a equipe dez de naruto com o respaldo ideal para a equipe dez e manda naruto aperfeioar seu novo jutsu em 24 horas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades De Kakuzu
programme.desc: Shikamaru e choji do os primeiros golpes na batalha, mas esto contrariados com o poder de kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terrvel Segredo
programme.desc: Shikamaru e seus companheiros desesperadamente contra-atacam a ofensiva do jutsu de fogo. Mas usar continuamente rasengan e a espada relmpago causa desgaste em kakashi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Gnio Shikamaru
programme.desc: Shikamaru enfrenta hidan sozinho, no fundo da floresta e aps gastar todo seu chakra, ele tem um ferimento profundo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!
programme.desc: Naruto e a equipe kakashi chegam na hora certa para ajudar a equipe asuma. Sakura e sai receberam ordens de kakashi para ajudar shikamaru, que est lutando sozinho
programme.sub-title: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Estilo Vento: Rasen Shuriken!
programme.desc: Ino e choji ficam pasmos com novo jutsu de naruto, e kakuzu sente o perigo se aproximando. Mas ao lan-lo, o novo jutsu se dissipa antes de atingir kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Preo Do Poder
programme.desc: Naruto usa seu novo jutsu para derrotar kakuzu. Tsunade d boas-vindas na volta das equipes ao lar e manda que as equipes asuma e yamato faam uma pausa

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Determinao Do Shinobi
programme.desc: Justo quando a paz finalmente chega aldeia, surge uma informao de que o esconderijo de orochimaru foi encontrado

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Esconderijo Do Orochimaru Descoberto!
programme.desc: Naruto e jiraiya chegam s fontes termais. Como uma alternativa ao estilo vento: rasen shuriken, jiraiya sugere a naruto a colaborao de um ninjutsu com um sapo ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Encontro
programme.desc: No esconderijo de orochimaru guren testemunha sasuke derrotando mil oponentes. Tendo perdido a oportunidade para ser nova hospedeira de orochimaru no passado, guren abertamente expressa seu cime em relao a sasuke

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Conectando Coraes

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Noite Chuvosa
programme.desc: Atrs do esconderijo, rinji e gozu descobrem que um shinobi seguiu seus passos. Kakashi e sua equipe notam que o inimigo est usando um morcego para vigilncia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Amuletos
programme.desc: Na aldeia da folha naruto est ocupado treinando com gamakichi e gamatatsu.

programme.desc: Pssaros esto atacando os residentes de uma aldeia nos arredores Pas do Fogo. As equipes de Boruto e Sumire recebem uma misso em conjunto de identificar a causa dos ataques.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Seguindo as informaes dos aldees, Boruto e Sarada vo ao encontro de Jugo. No entanto, ao chegarem no local, o encontram transformado em um monstro feroz e sofrendo com os efeitos da Marca da Maldio.

programme.desc: Sumire consegue fugir com a ajuda de Nue e sai em busca de Wasabi e Namida quando, de repente, Jugo, Suigetsu e Karin aparecem.

programme.desc: Sarada e Karin tm dificuldades para lutar contra um inimigo que tem o poder de manipular livremente a Marca da Maldio.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action Comedies)

programme.title: Ragnarok, (2013, Science fiction)

programme.title: Demolidor - O Homem sem Medo, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem cegado por resduos txicos, que tambm ampliaram os seus outros sentidos, luta contra o crime como um super-heri acrobtico das artes marciais.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notrio criminoso chins.

programme.desc: Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)

programme.title: O Drago Invencvel, (2019, Action)

programme.title: O Monge Prova de Balas, (2020, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma histria em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a histria de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da mfia japonesa suspeita de ser vtima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingana, (2021, Action)

programme.title: Elmer Gantry, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: A Best Actor Oscar went to Burt Lancaster for his outstanding performance as a con-man-turned-preacher in this provocative indictment of religious corruption.

programme.title: The Fugitive Kind, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: In this Tennessee Williams masterpiece, Marlon Brando is superb as a paradoxical drifter drawn into the desperate lives of two passionate women, Maureen Stapleton and Joanne Woodward, in a small Mississippi town.

programme.title: The Rose Tattoo, (1955, Romance)
programme.desc: A neighborhood is disturbed when truck driver Rosario is killed by police. One day, his wife learns of Rosario's affair, and a new carefree, handsome Italian truck driver enters her life.

programme.title: Moby Dick, (1956, Action)
programme.desc: This stellar retelling of Melville's classic is unsurpassed in entertainment, imagination and high adventure. Consumed by an insane rage, Captain Ahab (Gregory Peck) has but one purpose in life - revenge on the great white whale who disfigured him.

programme.title: Odd Man Out, (1947, Crime)
programme.desc: A wounded Irish nationalist leader attempts to evade police following a failed robbery in Belfast.

programme.title: Shake Hands With the Devil, (1959, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Cagney stars in this action-packed tale of the struggle between the Irish Republican Army and the British Black and Tans, as an Irish-American medical student (Don Murray) takes up arms with the rebellion after losing his best friend!

programme.title: Greatest Show On Earth, (1952, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Charlton Heston stars as Brad Braden, the circus manager who lives and breathes to keep the show rolling. With the Big Top about to hit rock bottom, Braden hires The Great Sebastian, a daring trapeze legend, to revitalize the circus.

programme.title: The Mechanic, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: In this action-packed thriller, Jason Statham is a mechanican elite assassin with a strict code and unique talent for cleanly eliminating targets. Simon West (CON AIR) directs this hit remake of the 1972 Charles Bronson movie.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: Death Wish, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: When his wife (Elisabeth Shue) and daughter (Camila Morrone) are savagely assaulted, an enraged doctor (Bruce Willis) seeks his own justice, becoming part deadly avenger and part guardian angel in director Eli Roth's reinvention of the classic!

programme.title: Bloodsport, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Ninjitsu master Frank Dux journeys to Hong Kong to enter the Kumite, the Olympics of martial arts, and meets a beautiful American reporter. Before long he must face Chong-Li, a vicious Korean master of Tae Kwan Do, in a climactic fight to the finish.

programme.title: The Last Stand, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger stars as a small border-town sheriff who makes a defiant stand to stop a fugitive on the run from the FBI.

programme.title: Best of the Best, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Eric Roberts, Philip Rhee, Christopher Penn, John Dye and David Agresta play five men who are selected as members of the U.S. National Karate Team. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Warrior, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: WARRIOR tells the moving and inspirational story of the Conlon family, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), Tommy (Tom Hardy) and Paddy (Nick Nolte), who find redemption in the ring as they fight to repair themselves and their family.

programme.title: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers Of Benghazi, (2016, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: From director Michael Bay, 13 HOURS is the gripping true story of six elite ex-military operators assigned to protect the CIA who fought back against overwhelming odds when terrorists attacked a U.S. diplomatic compound on September 11, 2012.

programme.title: X, (2022, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A group of actors set out to make an adult film in rural Texas under the noses of their reclusive hosts, but when the elderly couple catches their young guests in the act, the cast finds themselves in a desperate fight for their lives.

programme.title: Pearl: An X-traordinary Origin Story, (2022, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Trapped on her family's isolated farm, Pearl must tend to her ailing father under the bitter, overbearing watch of her devout mother. Lusting for the glamorous life she's seen in the movies, Pearl's temptations and repressions collide.

programme.desc: Shinobu tells her husband, Kosaku, that she saw a stray cat in their basement with a hole in its throat. When Kosaku goes down to take a look, he finds the cat already dead, The next morning, a strange plant sprouts from the spot where the cat was buried.

programme.title: Hollywood Shuffle, (1987, Comedy)

programme.title: A mysterious being attaches itself to Naruto, while he was training in the forest. Tsunade begins to wonder if it isn't the legendary being known as the "Onbaa."
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Shino are given a mission to provide security during the Kagetsu family funeral, but they soon realize that the real mission is to help the eldest son carry out the man's unusual last will and testament!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: An ominous black smoke appears over the Land of Greens, and all of sudden Choji and company are attacked by an unidentified Ninja!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While questioning Yurinoshin and Shun, the Hidden Leaf squad learns the truth about Shun's true identity.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others are attacked by Ruiga, the first evil ninja, who can draw water from the earth to use as weapons.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is again attacked by the second evil ninja, Jiga. Jiga threatens Naruto's life when Hinata rushes in to save Naruto, but Hinata resists the threats and begins to fight!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Haruna are confronted by Renga. Declaring that he has taken down others before them, he advances on Naruto, ordering him to hand over the princess!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The princess has gained weight due to nerves and wants Ino to pose as the princess in order to attend the first meeting with a prince she adores.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Lee opens a dojo because he feels like he isn't keeping up with his training. He is hoping challengers will come to his dojo to face him in battle.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The first lady of the Land of Honey and her entourage have disappeared. Naruto, Kiba, and Hinata are sent on a mission and they discover an eerie castle looming in the middle of the road!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: During Lee's medical check-up, he discovers that there's a lot of damage in his chakra network. Guy tries to cheer him up by taking Lee to the Academy training hall.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Seeking revenge for his dead father, Genho, Yagura's true identity and oldest sibling of the Ryudoin Brothers confronts Guy using a unique Jutsu.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The ANBU Black Ops suspect that Genno, a carpenter of Hidden Leaf Village, stole important blueprints of the village. Tsunade concludes that the one who used Genno plans to attack the Village and puts the village on Super S-Rank Alert!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: ANBU Black Ops puts Naruto under retro-hypnosis to extract Genno's motives. Without much success, Hidden Waterfall Village will be conducting maneuvers close to the village borders.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While looking for the scattered blueprints, Naruto and his team realize that Genno's actions are a diversion.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others are shocked at the number of paper bombs placed throughout the village. While removing the seals, unexpected help arrives in the way of Homura and Koharu.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: A Simple Plan, (1998, Crime)
programme.desc: In a gym bag. That's how three men size up what they've found in the snowy Minnesota woods. They've come across a downed plane with a rotting corpse inside...and over $4 million stuffed inside a duffel bag. Finders, keepers? Maybe.

programme.title: Miami Blues, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: An ex-con (Alec Baldwin) tiptoes on the borderline of psychotic behavior, playing cops and robbers on both sides of the law. He robs and kills one minute and poses as a cop the next in this thriller with a comic edge.

programme.title: Original Gangstas, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: A fast-paced Action-Thriller about adults living in a crime-ridden area. They are tired of being bullied, and take matters into their own hands to rid the town of the criminals.

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.title: A Simple Plan, (1998, Crime)
programme.desc: In a gym bag. That's how three men size up what they've found in the snowy Minnesota woods. They've come across a downed plane with a rotting corpse inside...and over $4 million stuffed inside a duffel bag. Finders, keepers? Maybe.

programme.title: Bandits, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: The suave Joe and his hypochondriac partner Terry have escaped from prison. Cutting a swath from Oregon through California, these fugitives rob banks in order to finance their scheme for a new life south of the Border.

programme.title: Stand Up Guys, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Oscar winners Al Pacino, Christopher Walken, and Alan Arkin star in this action-comedy about retired gangsters who reunite for one last epic night.

programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: BrideandPrejudice, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Based on Jane Austen's classic novel Pride And Prejudice, with a musical twist, sparks fly, and cultures clash between a small-town beauty and a wealthy American. An acclaimed treat from director Gurinder Chadha.

programme.title: Mansfield Park, (1999, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: When a spirited young woman is sent away to live on the great country estate of her rich cousins, she's meant to learn the ways of proper society, but instead enlightens them with her own wit. Based on the beloved romantic-comedy Jane Austen novel.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Emma, (1996, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Emma is a mischievous beauty who sets up her single friends, making a hilariously tangled mess of their lives until she herself falls in love. Gwyneth Paltrow stars in this beloved adaptation of Jane Austen's novel.

programme.title: BrideandPrejudice, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Based on Jane Austen's classic novel Pride And Prejudice, with a musical twist, sparks fly, and cultures clash between a small-town beauty and a wealthy American. An acclaimed treat from director Gurinder Chadha.

programme.desc: When a spirited young woman is sent away to live on the great country estate of her rich cousins, she's meant to learn the ways of proper society, but instead enlightens them with her own wit. Based on the beloved romantic-comedy Jane Austen novel.

programme.title: From Prada to Nada, (2011, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Nora and Mary are spoiled sisters living the good life in Beverly Hills until their loving father unexpectedly dies.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Dance & Party)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: The Limey, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, an extremely volatile and dangerous ex-con travels from England to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his estranged daughter's "accidental" death.

programme.title: Nick of Time, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Gene arrives home after attending his ex-wife's funeral. Soon, his daughter is kidnapped. He is given a gun and told that if he hasn't killed that person in one hour and fifteen minutes, his daughter will be killed.

programme.title: Snake Eyes, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Set in Atlantic City, an assassination attempt thrusts a detective into a murder case with 14,000 potential suspects and a deadly conspiracy where nothing is what it appears to be.

programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gruesome scene adorns a pier in San Pedro, south of Los Angeles. Twenty-seven dead bodies. A burned-out ship smoldering in the harbor.

programme.title: Nick of Time, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Gene arrives home after attending his ex-wife's funeral. Soon, his daughter is kidnapped. He is given a gun and told that if he hasn't killed that person in one hour and fifteen minutes, his daughter will be killed.

programme.desc: In this laugh-out-loud indie comedy classic that launched the careers of its outstanding cast, two friends set out to rewrite modern dating from Los Angeles to Las Vegas.

programme.title: North Dallas Forty, (1979, Comedy)

programme.desc: Feuding with Sheriff Lyle Wallace (Ernest Borgnine), Martin Penwald (Kris Kristofferson) unites scores of his fellow-drivers via Citizen Band radio into a mile-long convoy which, powered by pent-up resentments, rolls along the Arizona highways.

programme.title: North Dallas Forty, (1979, Comedy)

programme.desc: Yugi is on a vision quest where he must travel through a past of evil to find and conquer his greatest foe... himself.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is in no shape to duel... but Dartz doesn't care! Dartz sends out his ancient annihilator Orichalcos Soldier to finish Yugi once and for all.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Valon is ready to take on the world and fight... for the heart of Mai? And the first adversaries standing in his way are Duke and Rebecca!

programme.desc: It's a duel thirty thousand feet in the air as Alister squares off against Kaiba on top of an airplane.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Alister dispatches his airborne arsenal Air Fortress Ziggurat! How can Kaiba defeat a monster the size of the plane itself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has taken over KaibaCorp! Can Kaiba, with Yugi's help, break into his own company which he's protected with the latest in security technology?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With chaos running rampant, Valon separates Joey from his friends for a final showdown with Mai's heart on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Valon's battle rages to its climax as Joey attempts to turn the duel around by augmenting the same armor that Valon used against him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Broken and battered after his exhausting battle against Valon, Joey can barely stand up, much less duel. However, he faces a fresh and determined Mai.

programme.desc: It's a rematch between the Pharaoh and Rafael - but this time, the Pharaoh doesn't have Yugi to protect him.

programme.desc: Rafael calls forth Guardian Dreadscythe, a ravaging reaper that can never be defeated.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After discovering the location of Dartz's secret base, our heroes are on their way to stop Dartz once and for all. Can they reach Dartz before he resurrects the lethal Grand Dragon Leviathan from its millennial slumber?

programme.desc: Dartz's secrets are finally revealed! As the answers to the most puzzling questions are exposed, the Pharaoh and Kaiba realize how much is at stake.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz plants the souls of our captured heroes into Mirror Knights to use them as puppets to fight the Pharaoh and Kaiba.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz summons the thundering Orichalcos Shunoros to pound the Pharaoh and Kaiba into pancakes!

programme.desc: The gateway opens for the final endgame as the world-devourer Grand Dragon Leviathan and the legendary Atlantis rise out of its watery grave!

programme.desc: Grand Dragon Leviathan's thunderous roars unleash hundred-foot tall waves worldwide! How can Yugi stop the annihilation of the planet?

programme.desc: Yugi and the gang have saved the world from Dartz and his Grand Dragon Leviathan, but they're about to face their biggest challenge yet.

programme.desc: How does Apdnarg Otum know all of Joey's strategies? How can Joey stop Apdnarg when he gathers his ancient cards to unleash the fiercest monster from the great past? But the biggest mystery... how can Joey not know who Apdnarg Otum is?
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong. However, there's more at stake than just winning the duel - Yugi's heart is on the line, whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship. Unfortunately for Joey, his next opponent is Zigfried Lloyd, who defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor in one turn.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zigfried activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor at the same time.

programme.title: The losers of the Colosseum battle who are being held below the infirmary have a surprising person in their midst! But do they have a clue as to their terrifying fate? Meanwhile, the Tontatta Kingdom's history is made clear.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Surprise! The True Identity of the Toy Soldier!

programme.title: Bartolomeo finally finds Luffy and starts to lead him to Zoro, while the toy soldier begins to tell the heart-breaking story of how Doflamingo cheated the Riku dynasty out of their control of Dressrosa!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Horrible Past! The Secret of Dressrosa!

programme.title: As the toy soldier's story continues, the sad fate of King Riku and his army, and his daughter Princess Viola, is revealed as well as how the people of Dressrosa fell into the hands of Doflamingo. And all the toys in the country share a mysterious secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Nightmare! The Tragic Night of Dressrosa!

programme.title: Zoro, Kin'emon, and Luffy are reunited again, but little do they know that their reunion is being monitored by a potential threat! Meanwhile, the battle rages on between Doflamingo and Law as these two powerhouses clash.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Showdown Between the Warlords! Law vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Zoro and Kin'emon make a mad dash to save Law but Navy Admiral Fujitora stands in their way, bringing his full power against them. The Navy is in hot pursuit as a ship approaches with unexpected visitors from the past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Two Great Rivals Meet Each Other! Straw Hat and Heavenly Demon!

programme.title: After revealing the horrible history of Dressrosa, Toy Soldier now shares their plan to liberate the Tontatta Kingdom and bring down the Doflamingo Family, Operation SOP. Luffy bumps into a heavily-wounded Bellamy and Bartolomeo
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Astonished! The Man Who Inherits Ace's Will!

programme.title: Usopp and Robin make their way via an underground tunnel dug by the tiny people of the Tontatta Tribe - a tunnel so small in fact, that Franky couldn't fit! Instead, Franky makes his way to the Toy House.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Operation SOP Starts! Usoland Charges Forth!

programme.title: As the contenders for the battle of Block D dwindle to only thirty, Rebecca has her hands full with the menacing Suleiman the Beheader! All hope seems lost that she can take him down and move on to the finals!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Burning Passion! Rebecca vs. Suleiman!

programme.title: The battle for Block D comes to a shocking end and the winner that emerges from the cloud of dust stuns the audience even more! Meanwhile, Luffy, Zoro, Kin'emon, and Wicka of the Tontatta Tribe are about to reach the lift to the palace.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Match?! A Surprising Result of Block D!

programme.title: Viola, aka Violet, once a great princess of the Dressrosa family, shows Luffy & the others a secret entrance into the palace which avoids the use of the heavily-guarded lift. In the palace's Suit Chamber, Navy Admiral Fujitora reveals his plans.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Admiral's Decision! Fujitora vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: The final round at the Corrida Colosseum finally begins, as Diamante joins the combatants in an all-out struggle to win the Flare-Flare Fruit! As the stakes escalate, can one champion beat the others & snatch the fruit from the Colosseum's newest hazard?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Final Round Starts! Diamante the Hero Shows Up!

programme.title: Luffy and his group continue their ascent towards Doflamingo's inner sanctum, but standing in their way is an executive of the family whose power is so strong moving past him seems impossible! Meanwhile, Cavendish learns the dark secrets of Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Moving Castle! The Top Executive Pica Rises Up!

programme.title: As Operation SOP finally gets underway but as Leo makes the dash to hide the Tatabasco grape in Sugar's fruit basket, Robin calls for an emergency stop to the plan! Meanwhile, Luffy, Violet, and Zoro are stalled by Pica whose sheer size overwhelms them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dragon Claw Strikes! Lucy's Intimidating Attack!

programme.title: Operation SOP is underway and nearing its final stage! But Trebol proves a far stronger guard for Sugar than was expected, so Robin hatches a plan to lure him away. But is there enough time to execute the plan before the ruse is discovered?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Defeat Sugar! The Army of the Little People Charges!

programme.title: The Tontattas are devastated by Trebol's furious attack, but as Usopp tries to convince Leo to abort the operation, Leo tells him about their commander Toy Soldier's stunning true identity! The Toy Soldier finally shakes off Lao G and gets moving again!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Last Light of Hope! The Secret of Our Commander!

programme.title: Zoro continues his deadly duel with the nearly indestructible Pica! While the Toy Soldier narrowly escapes Lao G only to come face to face with Gladius! Luffy continues his mad dash to the top of the palace to face Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rupture Human! Gladius Blows Up Big Time!

programme.title: With the Tontattas beaten, Robin turned into a toy, and Luffy, Franky, and the others busy elsewhere, Usopp is the last hope for Operation SOP! But will he be able to muster the confidence and courage to face the terrible Trebol?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Liar! Usoland on the Run!

programme.title: Usopp runs into trouble in his battle with Treebol, and flashback sheds light on how a young Kyros made the shocking transition from murderer to one of King Riku's most trusted men.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Fateful Encounter! Kyros and King Riku!

programme.title: In the Royal Palace, Viola, Luffy, and the Toy Soldier have hidden themselves outside Doflamingo's chamber, only to have more enemies approach from behind, leaving them surrounded! Meanwhile, Franky is knocked out cold by the Navy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Operation Failed! Usoland the Hero Dies?!

programme.title: Toys all across Dressrosa regain their human form, a flood of forgotten memories return, and Kyros launches a long overdue attack on the villainous tyrant Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legend is Back! Kyros' All-out Blow!

programme.title: Kyros finally taking down Doflamingo leaves Doflamingo's clan shocked! Meanwhile at the Colosseum, Rebecca gets her memories of her loving father Kyros back, and Sabo makes a move to end the championship battle by blowing up the whole ring!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fire Fist Strikes! The Flare-Flare Fruit Power Returns!

programme.title: Luffy hurries to free Law, but with their pirate alliance dissolved, will Law still see Luffy as an ally? Meanwhile, Usopp has convinced his newfound followers to destroy the factory! Doflamingo's defeat has thrown Dressrosa into chaos.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dashing onto the Scene! The Chief of Staff of the Revolutionary Army - Sabo!

programme.title: The mystery of Doflamingo's return from the dead is revealed! But there isn't much time to ponder how it happened, as his plan to silence the country of Dressrosa unfolds, spelling doom for the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Devil's Trap! A Dressrosa Extermination Plan!

programme.title: As the people of Dressrosa see their friends and loved ones slaughter each other under the manipulation of Doflamingo, memories of 10 years ago rush back, and the truth of that event becomes clear. Doflamingo announces the rules for his deadly game.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The 500 Million Berry Man! Target: Usoland!

programme.title: Doflamingo and Fujitora's agreement to not engage each other lasts for the moment - meaning all eyes are turned towards taking down the Straw Hats and claiming the rewards! And as Luffy starts heading to the Royal Palace, Fujitora stands in his way!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Breaking through Enemy Lines! Luffy and Zoro Launch the Counter-Attack!

programme.title: Robin, Usopp, the Tontattas and the others make moves to rejoin Luffy as Doflamingo's deadly game rages on! Meanwhile, Kin'emon makes it to the trash heap in his search for his friend Kanjuro - just as Pica emerges in the town.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: With a Rumbling of the Ground! The God of Destruction - Giant Pica Descends!

programme.title: With Luffy & the others recovering from Pica's attack, the game is afoot! Luffy has just enough time to regroup and set out to find Doflamingo, only to find that the dastardly Warlord has more enemies than he might realize! A strange argument breaks out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Gathering into a Powerful Front! Luffy and a Group of Brutal Warriors!

programme.title: Don Chin Jao and Elizabello successfully break Pica's giant arm but the rock giant is unfazed and starts throwing even more destructive punches at Luffy and his band of unwanted collaborators! Meanwhile, Navy Admiral Fujitora moves into action.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Steady Progress! Luffys Army vs. Pica!

programme.title: Luffy and Moocy fast approach the showdown with Doflamingo - while the others with a beef against him continue to tag along. Meanwhile, Violet finds the key to Law's handcuffs, and Rebecca pledges to deliver it to him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Shocking Confession! Law's Soulful Vow!

programme.title: Luffy makes headway toward Doflamingo's refuge, making his way through Doflamingo's guards, while down below Admiral Fujitora faces off against Sabo, who has the power of the Fire Fist from eating the Flare-Flare Fruit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Collision! Chief of Staff - Sabo vs. Admiral Fujitora!

programme.title: Luffy cuts a lucky break as Kelly Funk shows him a shortcut to the Palace! But all may not be as it seems... Meanwhile, Franky and Zoro are locked in one-on-one duels, while Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo enlist the help of the Tontattas.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Gets Caught in a Trap!

programme.title: Penned in at the bottom of a well, Luffy and Law are caught in a trap! But someone has come to save them who they least expect! Meanwhile, the Tontattas help Franky break in to the SMILE factory, and Bartolomeo resorts to tactics he used in the Colosseum.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Great Escape! Luffy's Tide-turning Elephant Gun!

programme.title: The Tontattas locate their captive comrades and seem to be able to get the message to them - the prison break is on! Meanwhile, heavy-hitters from the Colosseum turn from wringing each other's necks towards a unified plan.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A United Front! Luffy's Breakthrough to the Victory!

programme.title: Fast Color, (2019, Science fiction)

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden - T02E67

When she inadvertently happens upon a secret her employer is hiding, she finds herself in the middle of a conspiracy. Starring Halle Berry, Benjamin Bratt, Sharon Stone.

Starring Michael Greyeyes, Elle-Maija Tailfeathers, Forrest Goodluck.

programme.desc: An unemployed salesman (Ian Hunter) becomes successful after pitching an idea to a car factory. Starring Ian Hunter, Nancy ONeil, Peter Gawthorne.

programme.title: Almost Unsolved Heists
programme.desc: After a series of unsolved robberies in Montreal, police think they have the right woman in custody, but bank robber "Machine Gun Molly" is still out there; when she attempts one final heist before her retirement, her final getaway goes sideways.

programme.title: Finally Caught
programme.desc: When a divorced woman married to a verbally abusive husband is found murdered in her bed, all signs point to him until his alibi rules him out.

programme.title: The Wrong Daughter
programme.desc: When Danica, a child Kate gave up for adoption 17 years earlier, appears on Facebook, Kate invites her to come and live with her and her husband, but Danica has a secret. Starring Sydney Sweeney, April Bowlby, Cindy Busby.

programme.title: Staged Killer
programme.desc: A popular TV morning show hosts life begins to fall apart when a former co-anchor returns. Starring Chrishell Hartley, Nicole Bilderback, Jason Dolley.

programme.title: Finally Caught
programme.desc: An 18-year-old vanishes from an Aruba vacation.

programme.title: A Husband to Die For: The Lisa Aguilar Story
programme.desc: Attacked and left for dead, a pregnant woman starts to suspect that her own husband may be the culprit. programme.title: Snow Angel
programme.desc: After a fatal accident in a snowy village at the eastern tip of Quebec, a screwed-up ex-pro snowboarder decides to pack up her cabin and leave town for good, but someone -- or something -- seems intent on stopping her. Starring Kimberly-Sue Murray, Olivier Renaud, Catherine Berube.

programme.title: Mom vs. Matchmaker
programme.desc: Adventurous Vanessa and her mom are two peas in a pod that the matchmaker needs to split.

programme.title: Almost Unsolved Heists
programme.desc: After a series of unsolved robberies in Montreal, police think they have the right woman in custody, but bank robber "Machine Gun Molly" is still out there; when she attempts one final heist before her retirement, her final getaway goes sideways.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: James Lally admits that he has killed his partner Suzanne LaPierre; it takes more than confession for police to locate her body, leading authorities to a long interrogation with a character who seems more concerned with his own comfort.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: A messy divorce leads to a woman hiding a large sum of money with one of her close friends; when the woman goes missing, her friend, Ashley, is believed to be involved in more than just attempted fraud.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: After police discovers Melinda Pleskovic dead in her home just days before her daughters wedding, police turn to her future son-in-law when his story doesnt seem to add up; he has news of his own, break-ins at the Pleskovic home reveal the culprit.

programme.title: How Not to Hire a Hitman
programme.desc: New couple Leon and Valerie have one unfortunate thing in common, they both hate their exes. When Leons ex-wife and Valeries ex-husband are targeted for murder, it becomes a case of he said/she said. Who hired a hitman?

programme.title: Finally Caught
programme.desc: When a young FBI employee is found strangled to death in her own home, all signs point to her abusive ex -- until her diligent co-workers piece together the clues over several years to reveal that the killer is someone very unexpected.

programme.title: Million Dollar Lethal Listing
programme.desc: After buying the perfect suburban home, a couple encounter a stranger who claims to be the real owner of the house. They soon find themselves in a living nightmare as they try to unravel the secrets and lies. Starring Morgan Bradley, Jon Briddell, Ciarra Carter.

programme.title: Dream Horse
programme.desc: The true story of Dream Alliance, an unlikely racehorse bred by bartender Jan Vokes. With very little money and no experience, Jan convinces her neighbors to chip in their meager earnings to help raise Dream and compete with the racing elites. Starring Toni Collette, Damian Lewis, Owen Teale.

programme.title: The Great British Heist
programme.desc: Three bank robbers take refuge in a local club as the police close in. While the long arm of the law surrounding them outside their sanctuary inside the club is threatened as they start to wonder, are their hostages all that they seem to be? Starring David Brook, Kane Cantell, Richard Harding.

programme.title: Million Dollar Lethal Listing
programme.desc: After buying the perfect suburban home, a couple encounter a stranger who claims to be the real owner of the house. They soon find themselves in a living nightmare as they try to unravel the secrets and lies. Starring Morgan Bradley, Jon Briddell, Ciarra Carter.

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in a desperate attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his marriage. Covering as his marriage counselor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction. Starring Steve Buscemi, John Magaro, Britt Lower.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: Eve sees a strange woman watching her and her husband from outside their home. As the stranger slowly intrudes further into their lives, Eve begins to question if shes losing her mind or her husbands loyalty. Starring Tom Felton, Amanda Crew, Ashley Greene.

programme.title: A Friends Obsession
programme.desc: Megan moves across the country to rebuild her life. When she runs into one of her former colleagues, she is pleasantly surprised and the pair become close friends. When he wants more from her, he begins sabotaging everything in Megans life. Starring Karissa Lee Staples, Drew Seeley, Brian Ames.

programme.title: Mom vs. Matchmaker
programme.desc: Tall, dark and handsome Mikail is a stick master in hockey, but his love life is ice-cold; his mother is completely confident she can shoot and score a flame for her son.

programme.title: Know Her Name
programme.desc: Delving into the legacy of filmmakers and uncovers the mystery of why women, especially from underrepresented communities - like Zora Neale Hurston and Esther Eng were - have been erased through historical amnesia.

programme.title: Finally Caught
programme.desc: Four years after a mother is found murdered on a deserted road, investigators link evidence to an air force base where a standardized testing scheme helps connect the murderer to the crime.

programme.title: She Is Love
programme.desc: A divorced couple unexpectedly cross paths at a country inn. What starts as an awkward encounter leads them to revisit a love long lost. Starring Haley Bennett, Sam Riley, Marisa Abela.

programme.desc: A lonely and socially awkward woman tries to make a connection with a friendly new co-worker who takes her out on a date. Starring Daisy Ridley, Dave Merheje, Parvesh Cheena.

programme.desc: Tony is upset when he discovers a grey hair and Lisa is amused.

programme.desc: Tony hosts fight night with his friends on the same night as Lisas dinner party.

programme.desc: Tony and Lisas family argue over who should take custody of their children if something happens to them.

programme.title: Family Time - Hospitality
programme.desc: Lisa invites Tonys godparents to stay for a few nights but no one can get them to leave.

programme.desc: Lovita (Terri J. Vaughn) walks out on her mother but doesnt find a big welcome from Cedric, Steve and Regina (Cedric The Entertainer, Steve Harvey, Wendy Raquel Robinson).
